Package reversiblecircuit.nctlibrary

Class Circuit

java.lang.Object
reversiblecircuit.nctlibrary.Circuit
public class Circuit extends Object
This class represents a reversible circuit consisting only the MCTGate
Author:
AKASH

  • Constructor Details

    • Circuit

      public Circuit(int[] control) throws CircuitException
      Creates a Circuit object provided with the first gate control.

      Integer array representing the input point or GateControl has to be provided. Creates the circuit only when the argument is valid otherwise throws CircuitException, thus a circuit must have at least one valid MCT gate.

      Parameters:
      control - gate input lines
      Throws:
      CircuitException - thrown if any internal GateException occurs

  • Method Details

    • getGate

      public MCTGate getGate(int index) throws CircuitException
      Returns the MCTGate positioned at the index.
      Parameters:
      index - of the gate(starting is 0)
      Returns:
      MCTGate
      Throws:
      CircuitException - thrown when the index is invalid.

    • getOrder

      public int getOrder()
      Returns the number of input lines of the circuit.
      Returns:
      number of input lines

    • noOfGates

      public int noOfGates()
      Returns the number of gates in the circuit.
      Returns:
      number of gates present in the circuit.

    • loadInput

      public void loadInput(boolean[] input) throws CircuitException
      Loads the input of the circuit.

      Copies the content of the argument to the input buffer of the first gate of the circuit.

      Parameters:
      input - boolean array containing inputs for the circuit input lines.
      Throws:
      CircuitException - thrown if any internal GateException occurs while loading the input buffer of the MCTGate

    • loadOutput

      public void loadOutput(boolean[] output) throws CircuitException
      Loads the output of the circuit.

      Copies the content of the argument to the output buffer of the last gate of the circuit. Useful for reverse propagation.

      Parameters:
      output - boolean array containing inputs for the circuit output lines.
      Throws:
      CircuitException - thrown if any internal GateException occurs while loading the output buffer of the MCTGate

    • add

      public void add(int[] control) throws CircuitException
      Add a MCT gate.

      This method adds a MCT gate to the circuit. The gate should be provided as integer array.

      Parameters:
      control - integer array representing gate input points.
      Throws:
      CircuitException - thrown if order of the new gate do not match with the circuit or if any internal GateException occurs while adding the gate

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Clears all the buffers in the circuit.

    • propagate

      public void propagate()
      Propagate the input through the circuit.

      It propagates the input from the first gate through all the gates in the circuit in a single call. thus each gate buffer stores the immediate propagation result.

    • reversePropagate

      public void reversePropagate()
      Propagation in reverse order.
      See Also:
      • propagate

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
